snippet: The co-founder of a nonprofit group says her father taught her a valuable lesson about speaking before groups: rely less on your notes and speak from the heart.
lead_paragraph: The co-founder of a nonprofit group says her father taught her a valuable lesson about speaking before groups: rely less on your notes and speak from the heart.

headline.main: Conquering My Fear of Speaking in Public
headline.seo: Speaking in Public: How I Conquered the Fear
headline.print_headline: Conquering My Fear Of Speaking In Public
